summary: Comprehensive testing of Smart Livestock Care (SLC) - Vet Batch 2: Clinical Registers (Surgical, Gynaecology, Castration) and GVA Module completed. All backend APIs (21 tests) passed with 100% success rate. Frontend UI testing verified all three clinical registers and GVA Analysis module functionality.

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all clinical registers and GVA pages working)

seed_data_creation: Test cases created during backend testing with TEST- prefix tags (TEST-SURG-001, TEST-GYN-001, TEST-CAST-001). GVA reports created with test village names.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Vet Batch 2 features (Clinical Registers and GVA Module) are working correctly. Backend APIs tested with pytest (21 tests). Frontend UI tested with Playwright for Surgical Register, Gynaecology Register, Castration Register, and GVA Analysis. All case number formats follow the pattern PREFIX-YYYY-XXXXX. GVA calculations are working with proper breakdown of Milk, Meat, and Egg GVA. PDF download is functional.

surgical_register.list_view: Shows cases with SURG-YYYY-XXXXX format, surgery type, species, outcome badge
surgical_register.new_case_dialog: Tag/ID, Farmer Name, Village, Phone, Species, Breed, Age, Surgery Type, Pre-Op Condition, Anesthesia Type/Details, Surgical Procedure, Findings, Post-Op Care, Outcome, Follow-up Date, Remarks
surgical_register.filters: Search by case number/tag/farmer, Species filter, Outcome filter

gynaecology_register.list_view: Shows cases with GYN-YYYY-XXXXX format, condition, species, result badge
gynaecology_register.new_case_dialog: Tag/ID, Farmer Name, Village, Phone, Species, Breed, Age, Parity, Last Calving Date, Breeding History, Condition, Symptoms, Per-Rectal Findings, Diagnosis, Treatment, Prognosis, Follow-up Date, Result, Remarks
gynaecology_register.filters: Search by case number/tag/farmer, Species filter, Condition filter

castration_register.list_view: Shows cases with CAST-YYYY-XXXXX format, method, species, outcome badge
castration_register.new_case_dialog: Tag/ID, Farmer Name, Village, Phone, Species, Breed, Age, Body Weight, Castration Method, Anesthesia Used/Details, Procedure Details, Outcome, Post-Op Care, Follow-up Date, Remarks
castration_register.filters: Search by case number/tag/farmer, Species filter, Method filter

gva_analysis.input_data_tab: Livestock Census (Cattle, Buffalo, Sheep, Goat, Poultry), Milk Parameters (Yield, Price), Meat Parameters (Live Weight, Price), Poultry & Egg Parameters (Eggs/Bird, Egg Price, Poultry Meat Price), Location Details
gva_analysis.results_tab: Total Village GVA, Milk GVA breakdown, Sheep & Goat Meat GVA, Buffalo Meat GVA, Poultry Meat GVA, Egg GVA with GSDP and Input Cost calculations
gva_analysis.history_tab: List of previous GVA reports with village name, district, date, total GVA, View and Download buttons
